|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3R12E40DBF-8E; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367S; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G, |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan-ng, OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/26/2018 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = solderer |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1706123'''C5-4.0''' ''Rev1.0sp1''" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. * Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net * OpenWrt wiki: https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c5_v4 * OpenWrt forum: https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-new-archer-c5-v4/15889 ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tp-link-archer-c5-v4-review ''TP-Link Archer C5 v4 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Padavan-ng firmware=== {{SCollapse2|[https://gitlab.com/dm38/padavan-ng/commit/769e9b510b1c49d6f403e54fe4c69e1183a5c017 firmware: add support for TP-Link Archer C5 V4] |
 trunk/configs/boards/TPLINK/TL_C5-V4/board.h
	
/* TP-LINK ARCHER C2 V1 */

#define BOARD_PID		"TL_C5-V4"
#define BOARD_NAME		"TL_C5-V4"
#define BOARD_DESC		"TP-Link Archer C5 Wireless Router"
#define BOARD_VENDOR_NAME	"TP-LINK Technologies CO., LTD."
#define BOARD_VENDOR_URL	"http://www.tp-link.com/en"
#define BOARD_MODEL_URL		"http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/Archer-C5_V4.html"
#define BOARD_BOOT_TIME		25
#define BOARD_FLASH_TIME	120
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_RESET	13
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_WPS	2
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_WPS	1
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ALL
#undef BOARD_GPIO_LED_WIFI	72	/* hw led */
#define  BOARD_GPIO_LED_SW2G	14
#define  BOARD_GPIO_LED_SW5G	12
#define  BOARD_GPIO_LED_POWER	42
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_LAN	8
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN	10
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN_INVERTED
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN_PHY
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN_PHY_INVERTED
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_USB	7
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ROUTER
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB_ON
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB2
#define BOARD_HAS_5G_11AC	1
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ETH_LEDS	2
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_L1000	1
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_W1000	1

  trunk/configs/boards/TPLINK/TL_C5-V4/board.mk
	
##################################################################
# Board PID # Board Name       # PRODUCT # Note
##################################################################
# ARCHERC2  # TP-LINK ARCHER C2    # MT7620  #
##################################################################
CFLAGS += -DBOARD_ARCHER_C5 -DVENDOR_TPLINK
BOARD_NUM_USB_PORTS=1

### TP-LINK firmware description ###
TPLINK_HWID := 0x04DA857C
TPLINK_HWREV := 0x0C000600
TPLINK_HWREVADD := 0x04000000
TPLINK_FLASHLAYOUT := 8Mmtk
TPLINK_HVERSION=3
}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c5_v4 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c5_v4 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-new-archer-c5-v4/15889 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 3.3V (115200, 8N1) - labeled J2 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" | 1 = J2 | 2 | 3 | 4 |- | TX | RX | GND | VCC |} {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
